bibl.title: After Alexander. The Time of the Diadochi (323-281 BC).
bibl.note: Revised proceedings of an international symposium on ""The Time of the Diadochi (323-281 BC)"", held at the University of La Coruña (Spain), in September 2010. 18 contributions. - Pp. ix-x: V.A.Tr., Preface; - 1-5: E.M.A., Introduction; - 271-277: Index.
bibl.seg: Víctor Alonso Troncoso & Edward M. Anson (edd.), After Alexander. The Time of the Diadochi (323-281 BC).
Oxford - Oakville, CT, Oxbow Books, 2013, 8°, x-277 pp., figg. ISBN 978-1-84217-512-5. £36.

Revised proceedings of an international symposium on ""The Time of the Diadochi (323-281 BC)"", held at the University of La Coruña (Spain), in September 2010. 18 contributions. - Pp. ix-x: V.A.Tr., Preface; - 1-5: E.M.A., Introduction; - 271-277: Index.
C.R. par Jeffrey D. Lerner, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2013/2013-08-24.html >. - Jean A. Straus, AntCl 83 (2014) pp. 415-416.
